section.name: Processors
section.p: During project initialization the product definition is consulted to determin the resource types that the project produces. Using the builder configuration, processors are selected, sorted, and assigned to current ant project to handle type production.

subsection.name: Technical Note
subsection.p: The APIs relating to processor declaration should be considered as non-final. In effect there is the need for model improvements to support the declaration of processors that don't produce a specific type but instead are involved in the contribution to type production. For example - a listener dealing with rmic compilation does not itself produce an build artifact but could contribute to a jar process.
